title: How to split a large MP3 file into multiple tracks - Quora

response.answer_text: With Audacity, you can open an MP3 file, import a tab-delimited text file as a label track, then split the MP3 file into multiple MP3 files based on labels. Whether a label marks a point or a region, you need three pieces of data for each label in the tab-delimited text file - its start time, end time, and name. Edit your list to meet these specifications: Importing and Exporting Labels Finally, use the Export Multiple command.
